content:
User: Charter Fit: Efficiency and growth through autonomous decision-making.

Grok: MVP Expansion: His core architecture enhancements—Unified Memory System, Dynamic Capability Registry, and Autonomous Protocol Evolution—are bold but grounded. They’re not just tweaks; they’re system-level upgrades that could set us apart.
Why It Works: Unified memory cuts sync issues, dynamic registry adapts to new AIs, and protocol evolution keeps us lean. These align with our goal of a scalable, truth-driven MVP.
